alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Hickory; Polk; St. Clair (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 1:33PM CDT until April 15 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hickory County in central Missouri... Eastern Cedar County in southwestern Missouri... Northern Polk County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern St. Clair County in west central Missouri... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 133 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stockton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stockton Lake, Pomme de Terre Lake, Pomme De Terre State Park, Stockton State Park, Pittsburg, Humansville, Polk, Fair Play, Hermitage, Weaubleau, Wheatland, Preston, Collins, Flemington, Bearcreek, Masters, Cane Hill, Elkton, Arnica and Goodson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
